version_description:
- Game Center achievements.
- RP and Credit doublers.
- Improved loading times.
- Improved UI responsiveness.
- Fan button, show us the love!
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Game Center achievements.
- RP and Credit doublers.
- Improved loading times.
- Improved UI responsiveness.
- Fan button, show us the love!
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed alloy edge glow effect.
- Fixed close-call scoring ;)
- Stopped wrecking balls from getting stuck.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed alloy edge glow effect.
- Fixed close-call scoring ;)
- Stopped wrecking balls from getting stuck.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Level up quicker.
- 2 new cars.
- Cloud saving.
- Upgraded engine visuals.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Level up quicker.
- 2 new cars.
- Cloud saving.
- Upgraded engine visuals.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug which stopped you buying alloys for certain cars.
- Fixed a bug where reputation and credits earned were not displayed.
- Fixed crash which happened when entering the car store.
- Fixed crash which happened after playing multiple events.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug which stopped you buying alloys for certain cars.
- Fixed a bug where reputation and credits earned were not displayed.
- Fixed crash which happened when entering the car store.
- Fixed crash which happened after playing multiple events.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Challenges are now easier and give repeat rewards!
- New photo mode in the pause menu! Compose the perfect screenshot to share with your friends!
- 2 exciting new cars!
- Find your favorite challenges easier with new previews in the event selection menu.
- Fixed some cars that didn’t excite the crowd.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Challenges are now easier and give repeat rewards!
- New photo mode in the pause menu! Compose the perfect screenshot to share with your friends!
- 2 exciting new cars!
- Find your favorite challenges easier with new previews in the event selection menu.
- Fixed some cars that didn’t excite the crowd.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug where Game Center initialization would stop the game from loading.
- Added restore purchases feature in settings menu.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug where Game Center initialization would stop the game from loading.
- Added restore purchases feature in settings menu.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Login with Facebook to compete against your friends and dominate the leaderboards!
- Custom color alloys, skins and tire smoke.
- 2 new burnout drivers cars.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Login with Facebook to compete against your friends and dominate the leaderboards!
- Custom color alloys, skins and tire smoke.
- 2 new burnout drivers cars.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Shiny new icon.
- Fixed a bug which occurred when ordering upgrades.
- Fixed a bug which caused items to show incorrect prices.
- Fixed the handbrake not working on some cars.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Shiny new icon.
- Fixed a bug which occurred when ordering upgrades.
- Fixed a bug which caused items to show incorrect prices.
- Fixed the handbrake not working on some cars.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Added more car customization.
- 2 new burnout drivers cars.
- Made color-able tires remember previous purchase color.
- Added button in settings menu to clear red flags.
- Fixed a bug which stopped you from canceling a car order.
- Fixed a bug which caused some cars to get stuck in 1st gear.
- Fixed a bug which occasionally caused a grey screen on fixing engines.
- Improved the automatic reset for when cars flip or get stranded.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- 4 Australia Day skins.
- 2 exciting new burnout drivers cars.

- New Brashernats / Sydney Dragway burnout track to compete on.
- Exclusive Bronze, Silver and Gold skins for all non drivers cars.

- A new car and engine.

- New Brashernats / Sydney Dragway burnout track to compete on.
- Exclusive Bronze, Silver and Gold skins for all non drivers cars.
- Fixed a bug which caused engine parts to disappear on some devices.
- A new car and engine.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug that was crashing the game on start for some devices.
- Fixed various visual bugs related to car appearance.
- Fixed an issue with engines not displaying correctly on some devices.
- Optimizations to the screenshot capture mode.
- Tweaks to the Brashernats crane view camera.
- Performance improvements and other minor bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug that was crashing the game on start for some devices.
- Fixed various visual bugs related to car appearance.
- Fixed an issue with engines not displaying correctly on some devices.
- Optimizations to the screenshot capture mode.
- Tweaks to the Brashernats crane view camera.

- Performance improvements and bug fixes.
- iOS 11 update.

Thanks you for your continued support. We're working hard at improving Torque Burnout. If you're experiencing issues please submit a bug report.

- Performance improvements and bug fixes.
- iOS 11 update.

Thanks you for your continued support. We're working hard at improving Torque Burnout. If you're experiencing issues please submit a bug report.

- Fixed an issue with the game crashing in the garage.
- Other minor bug fixes.
- Introducing a real life events calendar, available next to the settings button in the garage.

Thanks you for your continued support. We're working hard at improving Torque Burnout. If you're experiencing issues please submit a bug report.

- Fixed an issue with the game crashing in the garage.
- Other minor bug fixes.
- Introducing a real life events calendar, available next to the settings button in the garage.

Thanks you for your continued support. We're working hard at improving Torque Burnout. If you're experiencing issues please submit a bug report.

- Tyre Fires! If your tires are too hot they now burst into flames.
- Burn your paint job by settings your tires on fire.
- New Ulegal skins and engine.
- New free car, WZRD
- Performance improvements in garage to reduce crashing.
- Bug fixes.

- Tyre Fires! If your tires are too hot they now burst into flames.
- Burn your paint job by settings your tires on fire.
- New Ulegal skins and engine.
- New free car, WZRD
- Performance improvements in garage to reduce crashing.
- Bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue with the custom paint slider not showing a preview on the car.
- Fixed a bug where tyres were gaining heat rapidly after an event ends.
- Various visual bug fixes.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue with the custom paint slider not showing a preview on the car.
- Fixed a bug where tyres were gaining heat rapidly after an event ends.
- Various visual bug fixes.
- Other minor bug fixes.

Happy holidays!
The team at Torque Burnout would like to wish you a relaxing and enjoyable break.
For a limited time we've dressed up some of the game to celebrate.

- iPhoneX Support!
- Shipping yard is now covered in snow!
- Screenshot mode now includes a festive frame.
- Keep you cars warm on Shipping yard with a new a festive hat.

- iPhoneX Support!
- Shipping yard is now covered in snow!
- Screenshot mode now includes a festive frame.
- Keep you cars warm on Shipping yard with a new a festive hat.

Exclusive cars from StreetOutlaws and 1320video!
Introducing 2 of Americas most notorious street racing cars.
- StreetOutlaws personalities Farmtruck and AZN and their Farmtruck.
- 1320video's Unicorn Vette.

Exclusive cars from StreetOutlaws and 1320video!
Introducing 2 of Americas most notorious street racing cars.
- StreetOutlaws personalities Farmtruck and AZN and their Farmtruck.
- 1320video's Unicorn Vette.

We've got another MASSIVE update.
Including some of the most requested tuning features!
- Manual transmission.
- Wheel Tubbing.
- Adjustable tire pressure, and much more!
- 4 new non-drivers cars.
- New Shiny app icon and splash screen.
- A hidden special feature in the garage.
- New engine and paint job for ULEGAL.

We've got another MASSIVE update.
Including some of the most requested tuning features!
- Manual transmission.
- Wheel Tubbing.
- Adjustable tire pressure, and much more!
- 4 new non-drivers cars.
- New Shiny app icon and splash screen.
- A hidden special feature in the garage.
- New engine and paint job for ULEGAL.
- Fixed an issue with Facebook Login.
- Fixed an issue with Facebook Login.

3 new cars, including some of Australia's most iconic.
- 2 new non-driver cars.
- 1 new 'Just for fun' vehicle, a Forklift!
- New Ulegal skin.
- Lots of bug fixes!

3 new cars, including some of Australia's most iconic.
- 2 new non-driver cars.
- 1 new 'Just for fun' vehicle, a Forklift!
- New Ulegal skin.
- Lots of bug fixes!

- Fixed a bug where some users couldn't save screenshots.
- Various other bug fixes in the lead up to our next few big exciting updates!

- Fixed a bug where some users couldn't save screenshots.
- Various other bug fixes in the lead up to our next few big exciting updates!

Pick your side!
It's Red vs Blue with Torque Burnouts new real world drivers cars!
- New Real world drivers car, GEMSKID!
- New Real world drivers car, WARBIRD!
- Various bug fixes.

Pick your side!
It's Red vs Blue with Torque Burnouts new real world drivers cars!
- New Real world drivers car, GEMSKID!
- New Real world drivers car, WARBIRD!
- Various bug fixes.

Introducing the brand new burnout pad, Long Beach Garage!

Located in sunny California, this split level pad has more than a few hidden surprises!

We have also added a new unlockable wagon, ready and waiting for you to lay down some fresh rubber.

- New Burnout Pad, Long Beach Garage!
- Brand New Stock Wagon!
- Driver Car Test Drives
- New Objectives!
- Removal of some branded content.
- Bug fixes.

You requested them, so we added them! This months update includes two of the most iconic Aussie sedans to have ever existed!!!

Also Christmas is on the way, we've also dressed up some of the game to celebrate!

- 2 new non-driver cars (that might just break the fabric of time and space).
- Shipping Yard is now covered in snow!
- Keep you cars warm on Shipping Yard with a new a festive hat.
- Screenshot mode now includes a festive frame.
- Various Performance improvements.

Never miss that awesome burnout moment again with all new Replays!

Replays can be accessed from the summary screen after going for a burn, in tournaments and also on main menu where you can find your last 5 replays!

- New Replay system.
- Updated look, engine and wheels for 1TUFHG.
- Performance improvements for 64bit compatible devices.
- Fix for black screen that occurs occasionally when hitting a wall.

We've got another MASSIVE update this month with two brand new iconic coupes, and a host of updated features! Including the ability to search for specific tournaments by name and support for Bluetooth controllers!

- 2 new non-driver cars.
- Tournament Search.
- Bluetooth Controller Support (Driving only)
- Ability for all users to shuffle Objectives.
- Various Performance improvements.

HOTFIX for controller and store issues

With a history spanning 22 years, TUFFST is one of the most requested additions to Torque Burnout!

We have also added the ability to put different wheels on the front/rear of your car and the ability to test drive new driver cars before purchasing them!

Tracks can now also be express unlocked with our new Tickets currency. Just in time for Red Centre Nats!

-Real world driver car, TUFFST!
-Test Drive new driver cars
-Different front/rear wheels
-Express Unlock Tracks
-Updated wrap for GEMSKID
-Fixes crash at start-up experienced by some users.
-Fixes issue with tyres not being able to be applied to cars.

Unveiled at Summernats 31, THELMA is a purpose built skid car that’s sure to start a party!
We also have a new mechanic overview screen so you can easily share your perfect setups with other Torque Burnout players!

- New Real world driver car, THELMA!
- Updated look and engine for GOMNTL!
- New Mechanic Overview screen to easily share your setups!
- Fixed crash in plate editor.
- Various bug fixes.

Introducing Burnout Objectives and a new burnout pad, Red CentreNats!

Objectives tests your skills in completing various goals, tricks and challenges for new exclusive content. This replaces surveys and will continue to evolve.

Red CentreNats is a brand new burnout pad located in Alice Springs, ready for you to lay down some fresh rubber!

- Burnout objectives.
- New real world burnout pad, Red CentreNats!
- Updated UCSMOKE.
- Various Performance improvements.
- X4 new number Plate Skins.

Introducing custom number plates!

Create thousands of unique number plate variations for your stock cars using tons of different customization options. Choose from different plate sizes, custom text, colors, trims and backgrounds in a variety of styles and themes!

- New skin for ULEGAL.
- Custom number plate editor.
- Video rewards to halve order times in the store. (all orders)
- Save system changes.
- New icon and splash screen.

Happy holidays everyone!
The team at Torque Burnout would like to wish you a relaxing and enjoyable break.

As a holiday treat, we have a new real world driver car for you! AZN'S Dung Beetle!
For a limited time we've also dressed up some of the game to celebrate.

- New Real world driver car, AZN'S Dung Beetle!
- New Sicko skin and engine.
- Shippingyard is now covered is snow!
- Keep you cars warm on Shippingyard with a new a festive hat.
- Screenshot mode now includes a festive frame.
We've squashed some bugs and improved performance in the lead up to our next big update!

Introducing the brand new burnout pad, Long Beach Garage!

Located in sunny California, this split level pad has more than a few hidden surprises!

We have also added a new unlockable wagon, ready and waiting for you to lay down some fresh rubber.

- New Burnout Pad, Long Beach Garage!
- Brand New Stock Wagon!
- Driver Car Test Drives
- New Objectives!
- Removal of some branded content.
- Bug fixes.

We've squashed some bugs and improved performance in the lead up to our next big update!

Tournament mode is a big part of Torque Burnout,
so we've added tones of new ways to compete, keeping the competition fun and exciting.

You can now create custom tournaments with specific rules!
Including:
- Specific cars.
- Specific tires.
- Specific tracks per round.
- Score limit.
- Retry limit.
- No reverse.
- First person camera only.
- No specials (Nos/Slow mo).

With a history spanning 22 years, TUFFST is one of the most requested additions to Torque Burnout!

We have also added the ability to put different wheels on the front/rear of your car and the ability to test drive new driver cars before purchasing them!

Tracks can now also be express unlocked with our new Tickets currency. Just in time for Red Centre Nats!

-Real world driver car, TUFFST!
-Test Drive new driver cars
-Different front/rear wheels
-Express Unlock Tracks
-Updated wrap for GEMSKID

Introducing Head-to-Head Online Multiplayer!

Two cars, One pad. Real-time multiplayer against real people!

Play casual or ranked* matches with people from around the world or create custom games with just your friends.

Start skidding with your mates on Perth Motorplex, Brashernats and Concrete River, with more levels, features and improvements to come!

*Ranked mode coming soon.

- New Online Multiplayer.
- Performance improved for low end devices.
- Various Bug fixes.

Get ready for night-time skids at Perth Motorplex!

Each and every Wednesday, WhoopAss Wednesday provides an epic night of burnout action at Perth Motorplex! Satisfy that lockdown burnout itch with some night-time skids under lights!

Also recently added to the line-up we have two of the toughest cars in burnouts, BlownOutlaws!

- New real world burnout pad, Perth Motorplex Night!
- Two New Real world driver cars, BlownOutlaws!
